title: Facing an enemy within, struggling Norris needs to find answers fast
summary: A second F1 win in three grands prix has made Oscar Piastri look like the stronger McLaren driver, as Lando Norris admitted he is struggling to find answers

qa_pairs.question: Which McLaren driver recently secured two wins in three races?
What has Lando Norris admitted regarding his performance?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He is struggling to find answers.
wrong_options: He feels confident in his car's setup.
He has no concerns about his performance.

qa_pairs.question: What is the significance of the recent performance comparison between Piastri and Norris?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Piastri is perceived as the stronger driver at McLaren.
wrong_options: Both drivers are equally matched this season.
McLaren is facing severe financial issues.
